result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sean M Mason

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Sean M Mason not in court, in custody.  Attorney Melissa Anne Frost in court for Sean M Mason.  Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin. Video could not be arranged. Defendant is being released 11-8 and will be returned to Walworth Co. More motions may be coming from Defense. Minutes filed.
Motion hearing scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
DA's request for certified copies

ADDRESS INFO for Sean M Mason
Current: W5261 Aweogon Trail, Elkhorn, WI 53121 United States  (Effective: 10-10-2022)
Prior: Red Granite Correctional, Red Granite, WI 54970

1:02pm Court in session 

Defendant Sean Mason present in court, in custody via video from Redgranite Correctional with Attorney Melissa Frost via telephone. ADA Andrew Herrmann appears for the State of Wisconsin. 

Defense demanded speedy on 9/29/22
Status currently set for 10/26 but because of speedy demand Court needs to address scheduling now
Record by ADA Herrmann as to recent discovery requests
Court makes record as to co-conspirators
DA's office has 1 expandable file for all 11 Deft's that all Deft's & Attys have access to.
State still believes this trial could take up to 10 days
Record by State as to potential conflict with Atty Frost & another Deft she currently represents
Response by Atty Frost, she does not believe she has a conflict that requires any action at this time
Atty Frost does not believe this trial needs a full 10 days but defers to the State
Court suggests potentially bringing in a reserve judge.
State would like to try to keep this with Branch I & will try to complete trial in 5 days with jury selection the Friday before

12/2 Jury selection & opening statements
Witnesses to begin 12/5 morning

Further record by ADA Herrmann as to ongoing discovery

Court orders discovery ending 11/21
Further record by ADA Herrmann & Atty Frost

State understands that this trial will need to be complete in the 6 days given

State responds to Court's questions
State can have witness list available to Atty Frost by 11/4
Atty Frost just asks that it be provided as soon as possible
Court asks that witness list be complete by the 10/26 status date

Deft's current sentence ends 11/12 so Deft will be brought down to Walworth County & held on bond

Nothing further from the parties

1:17pm Court in recess
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 23, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury selection scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Defense
Scheduling Order will be provided to Attys via e-filing by the Court

Defendant Sean M Mason appeared by video.  Attorney Melissa Anne Frost in court for Sean M Mason.  Attorney Andrew Herrmann in court for State of Wisconsin. Called @ 1:21 p.m. Appearances made. Matter before the Court for arraignment. Record by Atty. Frost as to review of charges and penalties and enters not guilty plea. Further record as to amount of discovery and asks for status in 60 days. Court grants request and sets matter out.
Plaintiff's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

records.addlTxt: Notice of Motion and Motion for Establishment of Discovery Deadlines.
records.descr: Notice of motion and motion for discovery

records.addlTxt: With Exhibit #1 attached.

3:00 PM Defendant Sean M Mason appeared by video from Redgranite Correctional, in custody.  Attorney Melissa Anne Frost in court for Sean M Mason.  Attorney J.J. Crawford in court for State of Wisconsin. 
State called to the stand as a witness Samuel Barrett,  Deputy from Walworth County.
Samuel Barrett duly sworn by the clerk and testified on direct examination by ADA Crawford. Witness identified defendant on the video.
Exhibit #1 marked, identified and discussed.
No cross by Attorney Frost.
3:06PM - Argument by ADA Crawford.
Argument by Attorney Frost.
Court finds probable cause that a felony has been committed and that the defendant likely committed it and binds him over to stand trial on the charges.  

State is requesting 30 days for Arraignmnet.

Defendant is to appear via video.

Adj. 3:07PM
Arraignment scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Original Warrant filed with the court.

Defendant shall not possess or use illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia. Defendant will not in any way contact or attempt to contact any co-actor(s) listed and will avoid their residence/place of employment or any place they are located and will avoid causing any other person, other than defendant's attorney, from doing so on defendant's behalf.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person, or through a third party.  CO-ACTOR(S)/RESIDENCE(S): Kenneth W. Chadwick, Krystal D Gehrke, Jillian R. Leighton, Michelle A. Lyons, Christopher F. McFadden, Joshua C. Potter, Thomas D. Schultz, Frederick M. Taylor, Bryan N. Tidwell and Shauna Gonzalez Garza. Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.

Defendant Sean M Mason in court, in custody by video from Redgranite.  Attorney Melissa Anne Frost in court for Sean M Mason. Both ADAs appear, ADA Herrmann makes bond argument. Warrant quashed. Rights given and hearing requested, time period waived. Defendant serving sentence until November. State asking for cash bond. Minutes filed.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
